alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 06 at 11:49PM EDT until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Towaliga River near Juliette affecting Monroe County. For the Ocmulgee River Basin...including Jackson, Griffin, Juliette, East Juliette, Dames Ferry, West Macon, Macon, Clinchfield, Ocmulgee River at US 341 at Hawkinsville, Hawkinsville, Echeconnee Creek at Houston Road near Byron, Abbeville, McRae, Scotland, Lumber City... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Towaliga River near Juliette. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 16 feet, Minor flooding of woodlands in the natural flood plain begins along the river. Low lying areas of Byars Road...downstream and right bank from the gage on Monticello Highway or Georgia Highway 83 will begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:45 PM EDT Wednesday the stage was 15.6 feet and rising quickly. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:45 PM EDT Wednesday was 16.0 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 16 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
